ISSUE.TITLE: Error on remove item from cart
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: nopCommerce version: 4.30 Beta Steps to reproduce the problem: Sometimes getting below error on remove item from cart. `An unhandled exception occurred while processing the request. ArgumentException: An item with the same key has already been added. Key: 1 System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary<TKey, TValue>.TryInsert(TKey key, TValue value, InsertionBehavior behavior)` Here is Gif ![15_removecart](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/13154058/78068400-fbdc1200-73b5-11ea-8c6e-e7b42f5a0ff3.gif)

COMMIT.MESSAGE: #4425 Fixed issue with error when updating shopping cart
